flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

lines.text: Get a piece of paper and tape the paper on
lines.text_raw: Get a piece of paper and tape the paper on

lines.text: After you cut the paper, the tape comes off
lines.text_raw: After you cut the paper, the tape comes off

lines.text: Scissors, tape, marker, lens, rubber band
lines.text_raw: Scissors, tape, marker, lens, rubber band

lines.text: wrap the paper on the lens and mark it with a marker
lines.text_raw: wrap the paper on the lens and mark it with a marker

lines.text: Your mark will vary based on your lens, my minolta AF-50 prime and has to be shorter then a zoom lens
lines.text_raw: Your mark will vary based on your lens, my minolta AF-50 prime and has to be shorter then a zoom lens

lines.text: Take the paper off and cut the paper and replace it
lines.text_raw: Take the paper off and cut the paper and replace it

guide.summary: Make a lens hood for free.
guide.title: DIY Lens Hood
